about.title: Hakkında
about.appDesc: Zikr app make it easy for you to listen Holy Quran much more faster and easier with a list of readers constantly renewed and possibility of requesting to add your favorite readers, The app is available in two languages Arabic and English with several options to play Quran playlist
about.appPartnersText: In order to listen better and faster i used the following servers
about.appContactText: For suggestions or to report a problem
about.partnerText: Thanks for following sites to provide audio files, May God give them about us and Islam all the best
